metadata.Title: CVE-2018-16868 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - low
metadata.Description: A Bleichenbacher type side-channel based padding oracle attack was found inthe way gnutls handles verification of RSA decrypted PKCS#1 v1.5 data. Anattacker who is able to run process on the same physical core as the victimprocess, could use this to extract plaintext or in some cases downgrade anyTLS connections to a vulnerable server.

criterions.comment: gnutls28: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
